# Piano

# Piano

Piano instance - creates a piano that can play any note from any octave in any duration.

Kind: global class

  • Piano
    • new exports.Piano()
    • .note(note) ⇒ PlayableNote

# new exports.Piano()

initializes the piano object with all piano notes.

# piano.note(note) ⇒ PlayableNote

Gets a string consisting of:

  1. The note
  2. The octave
  3. The duration returns a Note object with the parameters and "Piano" as the instrument

Kind: instance method of Piano

Param Type
note String

Example

const C = piano.note('c34n') // C is now a Note object
C.play()                    // Plays the note
